class.name: AbstractUnivariateDifferentiableSolver

javadoc.text: Provide a default implementation for several functions useful to generic * solvers.
Construct a solver with given absolute accuracy.
Construct a solver with given accuracies.

javadoc.param: point Point at which the objective function must be evaluated.
javadoc.return: the objective function value and derivative at specified point.
javadoc.throws: TooManyEvaluationsExceptionif the maximal number of evaluations is exceeded.
